title: Robert Kiyosaki urges community to invest in Bitcoin amidst rising U.S. national debt
description: Renowned author and financial educator Robert Kiyosaki has taken to social media to advocate for Bitcoin investments as he expresses concerns about the increasing U.S. national debt.  Kiyosaki, best known for his book “Rich Dad Poor Dad,” recently made headlines when he revealed his purchase of more Bitcoins following the U.S. regulatory approval of a […]

title: Spot Bitcoin ETFs show strong performance days after approval
description: BitMEX Research reported a total net inflow of $532 million for spot Bitcoin ETFs just two days after the SEC approved applications

title: USDT and USDC holders exploring Pushd presale
description: Ahead of the Pushd launch, USDT and USDC holders are among those exploring the project

title: SEC chair Gary Gensler assures no breach after X hack
description: Gary Gensler, SEC Chair, confirms no additional breaches after an unauthorized party accessed the SEC's X account

title: All Top 10 Cryptos Down in Red as Bitcoin Drops Below $43K
description:
All the top 10 cryptos by market cap traded in the red zone, following BTC’s slump to the $43K region. Bitcoin’s price dropped significantly on Friday after registering a yearly high the day before. The crypto market capitalization dropped to $1.76 trillion, marking a 7.11% loss in 24 hours. CryptoRank, a leading crypto research and […]

The post All Top 10 Cryptos Down in Red as Bitcoin Drops Below $43K appeared first on Coin Edition.
